challenges.name: Hello World Angular
challenges.description: Create a basic Angular frontend that displays 'Hello World' and your name on the screen.

challenges.name: Animation
challenges.description: Add an animation to your Angular app.

challenges.name: Todo List App
challenges.description: Create a todo list app that allows users to add, edit, complete, and delete tasks.

challenges.name: Setup Challenge
challenges.description: Download and set up Flutter with Android Studio. Verify the installation by running `flutter doctor`.

challenges.name: Hello Flutter App
challenges.description: Create a simple Flutter app that displays 'Hello, Flutter!' in the center of the screen. Customize the text's style and background color.

challenges.name: Button Challenge
challenges.description: Add a button that updates the text to 'Button Pressed!' when clicked.

challenges.name: Navigation Challenge
challenges.description: Create a second screen and add navigation to it. Display a custom message on the second screen.

challenges.name: To-Do App
challenges.description: Build a to-do app where users can add items to a list. Include a text field for input and a scrollable list to display tasks.

challenges.name: Firebase Setup
challenges.description: Set up a Firebase project and integrate Firebase Authentication into a frontend of your choice.

challenges.name: Sign In Form
challenges.description: Create a sign-in/sign-up form that connects to Firebase Authentication. Populate it with at least three accounts.

challenges.name: Firestore Setup
challenges.description: Set up Firebase Firestore and populate it with any data of your choice.

challenges.name: Display Data
challenges.description: Connect your frontend to the Firebase Firestore and display the populated data on your app.
